casebody.data:
Katharine T. FULTON et al., Petitioner, v. The FIRST NATIONAL BANK OF FORT MYERS, Florida, a national banking corporation, Respondent. No. 45391. Supreme Court of Florida. Oct. 8, 1974. ROBERTS, McCAIN, DEKLE and OVERTON, JJ., concur. ADKINS, C. J., ERVIN and BOYD, JJ., dissent.

Rehearing Denied Dec. 10, 1974.
